verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1732>, when David dwelt<WH3427> in his house<WH1004>, that David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030>, Lo<WH3427>, I dwell in a house<WH1004> of cedar<WH730>, but the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Jehovah<WH3068> dwelleth under curtains<WH3407>.
And Nathan<WH5416> said<WH559> unto David<WH1732>, Do<WH6213> all that is in thy heart<WH3824>; for God is with thee<WH430>.
And it came to pass the same night<WH3915>, that the word<WH1697> of God<WH430> came to Nathan<WH5416>, saying<WH559>,
Go <WH3212> and tell<WH559> David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>, Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, Thou shalt not build<WH1129> me a house<WH1004> to dwell in<WH3427>:

for I have not dwelt in<WH3427> a house<WH1004> since the day<WH3117> that I brought up<WH5927> Israel<WH3478>, unto this day<WH3117>, but have gone from tent<WH168> to tent<WH168>, and from one tabernacle to another<WH4908>.

In all places wherein I have walked<WH1980> with all Israel<WH3478>, spake<WH1696> I a word<WH1697> with any<WH259> of the judges<WH8199> of Israel<WH3478>, whom I commanded<WH6680> to be shepherd<WH7462> of my people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, Why have ye not built<WH1129> me a house<WH1004> of cedar<WH730>?

Now therefore thus shalt thou say<WH559> unto my servant<WH5650> David<WH1732>, Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, I took<WH3947> thee from the sheepcote<WH5116>, from following<WH310> the sheep<WH6629>, that thou shouldest be prince<WH5057> over my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>:

and I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast gone<WH1980>, and have cut off<WH3772> all thine enemies<WH341> from before<WH6440> thee<WH6213>; and I will make thee a name<WH8034>, like unto the name<WH8034> of the great ones<WH1419> that are in the earth<WH776>.

And I will appoint<WH7760> a place<WH4725> for my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, and will plant<WH5193> them<WH7931>, that they may dwell in their own place<WH7264>, and be moved no more<WH1121>; neither shall the children of wickedness<WH5766> waste<WH1086> them any more<WH3254>, as at the first<WH7223>,

and as from the day<WH3117> that I commanded<WH6680> judges<WH8199> to be over my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>; and I will subdue<WH3665> all thine enemies<WH341>. Moreover I tell<WH5046> thee that Jehovah<WH3068> will build<WH1129> thee a house<WH1004>.

And it shall come to pass<WH3117>, when thy days are fulfilled<WH4390> that thou must go<WH3212> to be with thy fathers<WH1>, that I will set up<WH6965> thy seed<WH2233> after<WH310> thee<WH1121>, who shall be of thy sons; and I will establish<WH3559> his kingdom<WH4438>.
He shall build<WH1129> me a house<WH1004>, and I will establish<WH3559> his throne<WH3678> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.
I will be his father<WH1>, and he shall be my son<WH1121>: and I will not take<WH5493> my lovingkindness<WH2617> away<WH5493> from him<WH5493>, as I took it from him that was before thee<WH6440>;
but I will settle<WH5975> him in my house<WH1004> and in my kingdom<WH4438> for ever<WH5769>; and his throne<WH3678> shall be established<WH3559> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.
According to all these words<WH1697>, and according to all this vision<WH2377>, so did Nathan<WH5416> speak<WH1696> unto David<WH1732>.

Then David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> went<WH935> in<WH3427>, and sat before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; and he said<WH559>, Who am I<WH3068>, O Jehovah God<WH430>, and what is my house<WH1004>, that thou hast brought<WH935> me thus far<WH1988>?

And this was a small thing<WH6994> in thine eyes<WH5869>, O God<WH430>; but thou hast spoken<WH1696> of thy servant<WH5650>'s house<WH1004> for a great while to come<WH7350>, and hast regarded<WH7200> me according to the estate<WH8448> of a man<WH120> of high degree<WH4609>, O Jehovah<WH3068> God<WH430>.
What can<WH3254> David<WH1732> say yet more<WH3254> unto thee concerning the honor<WH3519> which is done to thy servant<WH5650>? for thou knowest<WH3045> thy servant<WH5650>.

O Jehovah<WH3068>, for thy servant<WH5650>'s sake<WH3820>, and according to thine own heart, hast thou wrought<WH6213> all this greatness<WH1420>, to make known<WH3045> all these great things<WH1420>.
O Jehovah<WH3068>, there is none like thee<WH430>, neither is there any God besides<WH2108> thee<WH8085>, according to all that we have heard with our ears<WH241>.

And what one<WH259> nation<WH1471> in the earth<WH776> is like thy people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, whom God<WH430> went<WH1980> to redeem<WH6299> unto himself for a people<WH5971>, to make<WH7760> thee a name<WH8034> by great<WH1420> and terrible<WH3372> things<WH1644>, in driving out nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> thy people<WH5971>, whom thou redeemest<WH6299> out of Egypt<WH4714>?
For thy people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> didst thou make<WH5414> thine own people<WH5971> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>; and thou<WH3068>, Jehovah, becamest their God<WH430>.

And now<WH3068>, O Jehovah, let the word<WH1697> that thou hast spoken<WH1696> concerning thy servant<WH5650>, and concerning his house<WH1004>, be established<WH539> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, and do<WH6213> as thou hast spoken<WH1696>.

And let thy name<WH8034> be established<WH539> and magnified<WH1431> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, saying<WH559>, Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, even a God<WH430> to Israel<WH3478>: and the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> thy servant<WH5650> is established<WH3559> before thee<WH6440>.

For thou<WH430>, O my God, hast revealed<WH1540> to thy servant<WH5650> that thou wilt build<WH1129> him a house<WH1004>: therefore hath thy servant<WH5650> found<WH4672> in his heart to pray<WH6419> before thee<WH6440>.
And now<WH3068>, O Jehovah, thou art God<WH430>, and hast promised<WH1696> this good<WH2896> thing unto thy servant<WH5650>:

and now it hath pleased<WH2974> thee to bless<WH1288> the house<WH1004> of thy servant<WH5650>, that it may continue for ever<WH5769> before<WH6440> thee<WH3068>: for thou, O Jehovah, hast blessed<WH1288>, and it is blessed<WH1288> for ever<WH5769>.
